definitions: the reduction of the force, effect, or value of something

examples.text: human security required the attenuation of a wide range of threats to people

shortDefinitions: reduction of the force, effect, or value of something

definitions: the reduction of the amplitude of a signal, electric current, or other oscillation

examples.text: the products are used mostly by aircraft manufacturers for noise attenuation in engine housings
attenuations of the order of 50 to 200 dB are required

shortDefinitions: reduction of amplitude of signal, electric current, or other oscillation
